follow africa water map: follow Africa Water Map on twitter using #africawatermap hashtag
follow africa sanitation map: follow Africa Sanitation Map on twitter using #africasanitationmap hashtag
twitter share text water: Check out progress of access to clean water by African nations with new interactive #AfricaWaterMap
twitter share text sanitation: Check out progress of access to safe sanitation by African nations with new interactive #AfricaWaterMap
other share text water: Which countries are on track with water? Check out the progress being made by African nations in their provision of clean water for all in the new #AfricaWaterMap. Find out where each nation is at now, where they are predicted to be by 2030, and if they are on track to reach everyone, everywhere with clean, safe water by 2030
other share text sanitation: Which countries are on track with sanitation? Check out the progress being made by African nations in their provision of sanitation for all in the new #AfricaSanitationMap. Find out where each nation is at now, where they are predicted to be by 2030, and if they are on track to reach everyone, everywhere with sanitation by 2030.

This map shows which African countries are on track to reach everyone, everywhere with access to water and sanitation by 2030, and what increase in access is required in countries that are not on track.
